description: This dataset contains a list of the URLs (web addresses), which host information about the business-related licenses and permits identified in the NY Licensing Center’s Business Wizard.  The NY Licensing Center’s Business Wizard helps users to learn about certain licenses or permits a business may need to get up and running in New York State.

name: NY License Center Business Wizard
